Dracona looked at Wolfgang..... "what are your orders, leader!?......." she
said with a hand on her head..in a symbol of loyalty (i
guess!)........awaiting a command.....
----- Original Message -----

Sent: Friday, April 21, 2000 6:18 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> :: Wolfgang ::
>
> :: Turns around and grabs Nemisis by the throat and hurls him to the
floor. ::
>
> Incase if you dont know, Nemisis, I am the co-leader of the alliance. I
dont
> know why Zardus is acting like he is the sole captain. Zardus and I agreed
to
> share the leadership. ( hint hint ) So, I am the leader and I give
commands,
> not take them. Is that clear?!?! Now, I order you to prep the defences,
> INGRATE!
